title: Firm Ops + Automation
description: A workflow for reducing busywork: intake, routing, document assembly, and repeatable internal playbooks.
checklist: Pick one workflow to automate (intake, forms, document assembly)
Create a template library and a change log
Roll out with a short SOP and ownership model
risk_notes: Automation should reduce risk, not create it; add review gates for high-impact steps.
Start with low-sensitivity data and expand after validation.
